channel.title: nativity on Orthodox Church of Kenya
channel.description: Recent content in nativity on Orthodox Church of Kenya

item.title: Nativity Message for 2019 (Sample--Not Real)
item.description: Beloved brothers and sisters in Christ, dear children, Christ is Born! Glorify Him! Kristo Amezaliwa! Tumtukuze! By the grace of God, we are once again deemed worthy to reach the great feast of the birth of the divine Word in the flesh, who came into the world to grant us “well-being,” remission of sin, of captivity to the works of the law and death, in order to grant us true life and great joy, which “no one can take from us.
